isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON 2000 SERIES™ (LCT) TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - CHECK TRANSMISSION LIGHT

svcproc.title: CHECK TRANSMISSION LIGHT
svcproc.para: Ignition voltage is applied to the CHECK TRANSMISSION light connector (26) on circuit 28 and 28A.

During the bulb check or a transmission fault the TCM will provide a ground from the gray TCM connector (3031) terminal 25, through circuit 125, connector (3036), cab interconnect (377), and circuit 92 to connector (26) terminal 2. This will illuminate the CHECK TRANSMISSION light.
